name: 20h Roguelike
description:
This small game was create as part of my personal challenge: Create game in Unity in 20 hours and stream most of the process. 

Use:

  • WASD for movement
  • Left mouse button for short distance attack
  •  Right mouse button for long range attack

My big thanks goes to amazing people on twitch:

  • unkn0wn126
  • Roiigen
  • petrpetrovic_x86
  • cirax856
  • johca
  • petrdanek2008
  • insumNika
  • tomasscz

Thank you soo much. Without you, I will not finish this.
